overview:
Effah graduated from the University of Cape Coast with a Bachelor of Education (B.Ed.) in Computer Science. He is a member of the National Society of Black Engineers and Globe Research Program. His passion for software development using the agile approach led him into the development of games, point of sales applications, electronic voting systems and church information management systems (CIMS).

Effah’s goal is to find better ways of using software in improving the daily activities of small and large scale businesses globally.
